data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Severno-Bački, Serbia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Severno-Bački, Serbia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Severno-Bački, Serbia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary: On average, 18 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Severno-Bački, Serbia.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please defend the 889 believers in Severno-Bački against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, the believers in the state of Severno-Bački, Serbia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bosniak people.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Severno-Bački. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Severno-Bački, Serbia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Severno-Bački, Serbia has a population of 123,800.

We estimate Severno-Bački has 889 people who might know Jesus, 97,181 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 25,730 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 139 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Severno-Bački to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
